item.title: 印度股市将迎来现实检验，财报季拉开帷幕
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 中国基准利率在央行转向中成为濒危物种
item.description: 中国人民银行行长潘功胜上个月表示，中国政府正在研究改用短期利率来引导市场，这促使交易员和经济学家给现有的一年期基准利率贴上了濒危物种的标签。【原文：The People’s Bank of China’s Governor Pan Gongsheng last month said Beijing is studying shifting to a short-term rate to guide markets, spurring traders and economists to slap an endangered species tag on the existing one-year benchmark.】

item.title: 印度盈利势头降温将挑战股市狂热
item.description: 印度股票投资者期待一个强劲的盈利季节来证明昂贵的估值是合理的，但他们很可能会失望。【原文：Investors in Indian equities expecting a robust earnings season to justify expensive valuations are likely to be disappointed.】

item.title: 亚洲股市追随全球股市反弹，中国却落在后面：图表
item.description: 随着全球股市的持续上涨，亚洲的涨势主要集中在日本、印度、韩国和台湾。值得注意的是，中国缺席。中国。【原文：As global equity bulls enjoy the ongoing market rallies, Asia has seen its gains concentrated in Japan, India, South Korea and Taiwan. Notable by its absence? China.】

item.title: 日本地区贷款机构为市场招聘人员悬赏巨型银行薪酬
item.description: 总部位于日本最大岛屿西端的地区性贷款机构山口金融集团公司（Yamaguchi Financial Group Inc.【原文：Yamaguchi Financial Group Inc., a regional lender headquartered on the western tip of Japan’s biggest island, is considering paying new hires with securities market expertise around the same compensation as staff at the nation’s largest banks.】

item.title: 因涉嫌管理不善，Redbox 所有者将被清算
item.description: Redbox Entertainment Inc.的律师和贷款人指控该公司前首席执行官管理不善，未能支付工人工资或为其健康福利提供资金，法官周三裁定，破产的 Redbox Entertainment Inc.所有者将被清算。【原文：The bankrupt owner of Redbox Entertainment Inc. will be liquidated, a judge ruled Wednesday, after lawyers for the company and lenders accused its former chief executive officer of mismanaging the business and failing to pay workers or fund their health benefits.】

item.title: 全球表现最好的航空公司股票战胜破产风险
item.description: 越南航空股份公司（Vietnam Airlines JSC）出人意料地恢复盈利，成为今年全球表现最好的航空股，摆脱了破产的风险，因为该公司在大流行病后的复苏终于获得了动力。【原文：A surprise return to profit has propelled Vietnam Airlines JSC to become the world’s best performing airline stock this year, shrugging off the risk of bankruptcy as the company’s post-pandemic recovery finally picks up momentum.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好S&P 500 指数首次突破 5600 点。谷歌母公司 Alphabet 放弃收购 HubSpot。中国收紧卖空规定。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. The S&P 500 tops 5,600 for the first time. Google parent Alphabet shelves efforts to acquire HubSpot. China tightens rules on short selling. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国原油库存下降提振市场情绪，原油延续涨势
item.description: 石油连续第二天攀升，原因是需求增长的迹象和整个市场风险偏好的基调共同刺激了市场情绪。【原文：Oil climbed for a second day as signs of growing demand and a risk-on tone across broader markets combined to aid sentiment.】

item.title: A&M 公司称，英国是欧洲企业困境增加最多的国家
item.description: 去年，随着英国经济增长乏力，陷入财务困境的公司比例在欧洲急剧上升。【原文：The UK saw Europe’s steepest jump in the proportion of companies in financial distress last year as the country went through a period of sluggish economic growth.】

item.title: 在中国的工业中心地带，习近平的改革计划需要付出代价
item.description:
利用国家力量加快先进制造业的发展，使尖端行业也面临供应过剩问题

。【原文：

Using state power to accelerate advanced manufacturing has left even cutting-edge sectors struggling with excess supply

】

item.title: 新加坡股价涨势有望延续，股息交易大放异彩
item.description: 新加坡股市多年来的最佳涨势可能还有后劲，因为美国潜在的降息措施增强了这个高收益市场的吸引力。【原文：Singapore stocks’ best rally in years may have legs as potential US interest-rate cuts burnish the appeal of the high-yielding market.】

item.title: 投资者看衰中国股市，认为全会缺乏影响力
item.description: 在一个重要的政治会议召开之前，交易商对中国股市的情绪有所恶化，因为他们对押注政策驱动的转机仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Sentiment toward Chinese stocks has deteriorated ahead of a key political gathering as traders remain wary about betting on a policy-driven turnaround.】

item.title: 温哥华投票决定阻挡著名山景以建造住房
item.description: 温哥华最著名的特质可能就是其风景优美的海岸山脉。【原文：Vancouver’s most famous quality might be its scenic backdrop of dazzling coastal mountains.】

item.title: 法官命令波多黎各公用事业公司和债权人寻找债务解决方案
item.description: 监督波多黎各电力公司破产案的法官指示各方通过调解达成一致的债务削减协议，并在至少 60 天内暂停大多数法律文件的提交，以迫使借款人及其债权人集中精力进行谈判。【原文：The judge overseeing the bankruptcy of Puerto Rico’s electric utility directed the parties to reach a consensual debt-cutting deal through mediation and put a hold on most legal filings for at least 60 days to force the borrower and its creditors to focus on their negotiations.】

item.title: 澳新银行为赢得交易夸大政府债券价值
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）报道，澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）在一年时间里虚报了其交易的政府债券价值，虚报金额超过 500 亿澳元（340 亿美元）。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. overstated the value of government bonds that it traded by more than A$50 billion ($34 billion) during a one year period, the Australian Financial Review reported.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将追随华尔街科技股涨势：市场综述
item.description: 在周四晚些时候将公布通胀数据之前，全球最大科技股的反弹将美国和全球股市推向新高，亚洲股市早盘也随之上扬。【原文：Asian equities were primed for an early advance after a rally in the world’s largest tech stocks lifted US and global shares to new highs ahead of inflation data due later Thursday.】

item.title: 日本央行考虑削减债券发行量，日本政府养老基金加紧行动
item.description: 就在日本央行计划减少债券购买之际，日本政府养老金投资基金正在成为国债需求的重要来源。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund is emerging as an important source of demand for the nation’s debt just as the central bank plans to reduce bond purchases.】

item.title: 马来西亚将维持关键利率不变，因补贴削减风险显现
item.description: 马来西亚预计将在周四维持基准利率不变，政策制定者将关注政府进一步削减燃料补贴计划可能带来的价格压力。【原文：Malaysia is expected to keep its benchmark interest rate unchanged on Thursday, with policymakers mindful of potential price pressures from the government’s plans to further reduce fuel subsidies.】

item.title: 中国人远离台湾，台湾转向东南亚游客
item.description: 随着中国游客的减少，台湾希望吸引来自东南亚的高消费游客，这一转变可能会重塑台湾岛的旅游业。【原文：Taiwan wants to lure higher-spending travelers from Southeast Asia as Chinese arrivals dwindle, a shift that could reshape the island’s tourism industry.】

item.title: Pimco 和 Silver Point 在 2022 年 Incora 债务融资的争夺中败下阵来
item.description: 包括银点资本（Silver Point Capital）和债券巨头太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Creditors including Silver Point Capital and bond giant Pacific Investment Management Co. wrongly stripped collateral rights from out-of-favor bondholders as part of a controversial $250 million rescue package for aerospace parts maker Incora, a judge ruled, potentially upending the company’s reorganization plan.】

item.title: 电动雪地车制造商 Taiga Motors 申请债权人保护
item.description: 电动雪地车制造商 Taiga Motors Corp. 在停止汽车生产和裁员三个月后，申请债权人保护，以寻求重组。【原文：Electric snowmobile maker Taiga Motors Corp. filed for creditor protection as the Quebec company seeks to restructure, three months after it halted vehicle production and pared its workforce.】

item.title: 法国大选期间商业不确定性激增
item.description: 法国央行的月度调查显示，由于企业担心投资和劳动力成本可能飙升，法国企业的不确定性在大选期间激增。【原文：French business uncertainty surged during snap elections as firms worried about investment and the potential for labor costs to jump, according to the central bank’s monthly survey.】

item.title: 联邦援助日渐减少，小额贷款市场面临早期信贷问题
item.description: 随着联邦大流行病援助的逐渐减少，4 万亿美元市政债券市场的信用质量正显示出压力的早期迹象，这也促使人们预期近年来评级上调的速度将快于下调的速度。【原文：Credit quality in the $4 trillion municipal bond market is showing early signs of pressure as federal pandemic aid winds down, spurring expectations that the rapid pace of rating upgrades over downgrades in recent years will ease.】

item.title: 维托尔与 SK 就加州燃料操纵调查达成和解，赔偿 5000 万美元
item.description: 加利福尼亚州总检察长称，在指控大宗商品交易商 Vitol 和 SK Energy Americas Inc.【原文：California’s attorney general said it reached a $50 million settlement with commodity traders Vitol and SK Energy Americas Inc. after it alleged the firms acted together to manipulate local gasoline markets.】

item.title: 中国购买第一批美国大豆用于 2024 年作物种植— 晚了约七个月
item.description: 作为世界上最大的大豆进口国，中国首次购买了下一季的美国大豆。【原文：China, the world’s largest importer of soybeans, made its first purchase of US soybeans for the upcoming season — months later than usual.】

item.title: 西班牙央行推迟宣布下任央行行长人选
item.description: 西班牙经济部长卡洛斯-奎尔波（Carlos Cuerpo）取消了原计划在议会宣布的下一任西班牙银行行长人选。【原文：Spanish Economy Minister Carlos Cuerpo has canceled a planned announcement in parliament on the next Bank of Spain chief.】

item.title: 据称法国农业信贷银行将牵头竞购法国兴业银行旗下汉萨银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）正在就可能收购法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）旗下德国消费金融业务汉萨银行（Hanseatic Bank）一事进行深入谈判。【原文：Credit Agricole SA is in advanced talks on a potential acquisition of Societe Generale SA’s German consumer-finance business Hanseatic Bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国大亨贾塔尼亚准备收购脱离管理的美体小铺
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由英国大亨迈克-贾塔尼亚（Mike Jatania）牵头的一个财团即将达成收购陷入困境的英国化妆品零售商美体小铺（The Body Shop）的协议。【原文：A consortium led by British tycoon Mike Jatania is nearing a deal to buy struggling UK cosmetics retailer The Body Shop out of administration, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 到 2029 年，非洲稀土将占全球供应量的 9
item.description: 非洲矿山的稀土产量将从目前的零攀升至五年后的全球近十分之一，从而在由中国主导的市场中创造新的参与者。【原文：African mines could account for nearly a 10th of the world’s rare earths in five years, climbing from zero today, creating new players in a market dominated by China.】
